entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:19 p.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 7:42 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:42 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
